"Bosey": "Yo! What do you think? Pretty comfy village, huh?"
"You ever need to know where anything is, you just feel free to ask, alright?"
"Hey, it's you! Eh? You heard I was lookin' for something?"
"Well, you heard right. I wanted to give you a little something as a sort of welcome, y'know? And I'm thinkin', I just know there's somethin' around here for ya!"
"Then, it came to me. The perfect gift. Problem is, I went and forgot where I left the darn thing!"
"I do remember putting it in an Item Container a while back..."
"But for the life of me I can't remember which one! Man..."
"Listen! I know this is supposed to be the other way around, but can you help me look?"
"What do you say? Think you can find it?"
"Finished your tour around the village? If so, you should probably head back to Garoa's place."
"If there's anyone you haven't talked to yet, you should go introduce yourself."
"Everyone's pretty excited to talk to you, and they might have some advice for ya besides."
"But if you're done bein' a social butterfly, you should probably head back to Garoa's place."
"Alright, go ahead and try equipping it!"
"That's the armor I wanted to give ya! Go on, try it on for size already!"
